scripts.git:init: git init && git config user.email 'your-email@example.com' && git config user.name 'Your Name'
scripts.git:commit: git commit -m 'Initial commit: ArchiSpace React + Node.js'
scripts.git:push: git branch -M main && git push -u origin main
scripts.git:setup: npm run git:init && npm run git:add && npm run git:commit
scripts.deploy:github: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub' && git push origin main
